mapper.insert: INSERT INTO evacomment (comNum, comWriter, comContent, comTarget_id, comRef_group, comComment_group, regdate) VALUES(#{comNum}, #{comWriter}, #{comContent}, #{comTarget_id}, #{comRef_group}, #{comComment_group}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT comNum, comWriter, comContent, comTarget_id, comRef_group, comComment_group, regdate FROM evacomment WHERE comRef_group = #{num} ORDER BY comComment_group ASC, comNum ASC
